definitions.definition: a description of how things might happen in the future

examples.text: The **worst-case scenario** *(= the worst possible thing that could happen)* would be for the factory to be closed down.
Similar scenarios are playing out across the country.
The more likely scenario is that interest rates will rise.
Under any of these scenarios, the company will run into debt.

definitions.definition: a written outline of what happens in a film or play

wordOrigin: late 19th cent.: from Italian, from Latin scena ‘scene’.
